channel.title: From The Pub
channel.itunes:subtitle: Darren Scott and Adam Wilcox discuss stuff and drink.
channel.itunes:author: Adam Wilcox & Darren Scott
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast from Darren Scott and Adam Wilcox on all the things men talk about in the pub; news, films, computer games, Nazi Zombies, women and other aliens.
